metadata.dc:author: Montalt, J
Giménez Vaillo, F
Marco Algarra, J
Ivorra Lahuerta, P
Grimaldos Ruiz, P
metadata.dc:description: We have studied a group of 8 patients that presented the Usher syndrome. We have analyzed their family genealogic tree, showing the hereditary pattern found. We have analyzed the cochlear and vestibular functions. The retinoic and ophthalmologic complications are evaluated. We have searched for possible olfactory and gustative neuroreceptors disease.
metadata.dc:title: Síndrome de Usher. Estudio genético, otoneurológico y oftalmológico.
[Usher syndrome. A genetic, otoneurologic and ophthalmologic study].
